examples: He memorized his girlfriend's address by heart.
The police officer took my name and address.
Give me your name and address.
The address is written in capital letters to ensure clarity.
I sent a letter to their address but haven't received a response yet.
words.defineEn: the information that helps us find a place so we can go there or send a letter or package to that place
words.defineVi: thông tin giúp chúng tôi tìm một địa điểm để chúng tôi có thể đến đó hoặc gửi thư hoặc gói hàng đến địa điểm đó

examples: Every age has its book, after all.
Boys his age are a law unto themselves.
Reckless youth makes rueful age.
His parents have not yet reached retirement age.
My parents came of age during the 1960s.
words.defineEn: the number of years something has existed or someone has been alive
words.defineVi: số năm một cái gì đó đã tồn tại hoặc một ai đó đã được sống

examples: Grasp all, lose all.
After all, one case of the trots hardly spells disaster.
Every age has its book, after all.
After all, love will find a way.
After all, an electrical brain is smarter than the sum of its parts.
words.defineEn: every number, part, amount of something or a particular group
words.defineVi: mỗi số, một phần, số lượng của một cái gì đó hoặc một nhóm cụ thể

examples: The copycat had bested the original.
Best three years of my life, hands down.
So what’s the BEST butt?
You’re the BEST.
Best I've ever seen.
words.defineEn: in the most excellent or superior manner
words.defineVi: theo cách xuất sắc nhất hoặc vượt trội

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
They both pay their employees badly.
She raised both arms above her head.
words.defineEn: referring to two things together
words.defineVi: đề cập đến hai điều cùng nhau

examples: Many banks have cut commercial builders off cold turkey.
The builders may have adhered to the letter of the law, but not its spirit.
Of the participating builders in the survey, 66 percent said they turned a profit in 1993.
The builders had done a really nice job.
But Roman road builders took the art of logistics to another level.
words.defineEn: someone who builds or repairs houses and buildings, often as a job
words.defineVi: một người xây dựng hoặc sửa chữa nhà và các tòa nhà, thường là một công việc

words.defineEn: someone who drives a big vehicle, called a bus, that carries passengers from one place to another
words.defineVi: một người lái một chiếc xe lớn, được gọi là xe buýt, chở hành khách từ nơi này đến nơi khác

examples: The rich businessman owned multiple luxurious cars.
At the charity event, the wealthy businessman's joke had everyone in stitches.
The wealthy businessman realized too late that a contented mind is a perpetual feast, and that money couldn't buy him true happiness.
Even the most successful businessmen have made foolish decisions at some point in their careers, proving that every man has a fool in his sleeve.
The successful businessman understood the importance of the saying 'the early man never borrows from the late man', and always started his projects early to avoid delays and setbacks.
words.defineEn: a man who works in business, especially at a high level
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông làm việc trong kinh doanh, đặc biệt là ở cấp cao

examples: The captain navigated the ship through rough waters with skill and expertise.
The boat captain guided us through the narrow canals of the city.
He wasn't going to make captain.
She wasn't going to make captain.
The old captain was dead as a dodo.
words.defineEn: the person who is in charge of an aircraft and responsible for its operation and safety
words.defineVi: người phụ trách máy bay và chịu trách nhiệm về hoạt động và an toàn của nó

examples: The café served a delicious breakfast sandwich with eggs, cheese, and ham on a toasted bagel.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
The café served a variety of coffee drinks, including cappuccino and macchiato.
She discovered a new café in the neighborhood.
words.defineEn: a small restaurant that sells drinks and meals
words.defineVi: một nhà hàng nhỏ bán đồ uống và bữa ăn

examples: I'm excited about the next episode of my favorite TV show.
The children were excited to try the unusual-looking dragon fruit, an exotic accessory fruit.
The children were excited to learn about colors in art class.
We are excited to travel to our friend's wedding in another state.
She was excited to buy new clothes for the summer season.
words.defineEn: feeling very happy, interested, and energetic
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất hạnh phúc, thích thú và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: Excuse me, I lost my train of thoughts.
Excuse me, but there’s a phone call for you.
Excuse me, is this the way to the station?
Excuse me, you're wanted on the phone.
Excuse me, but I don't think that's true.
words.defineEn: said before asking someone a question, as a way of politely getting their attention
words.defineVi: nói trước khi đặt câu hỏi cho ai đó, như một cách lịch sự để thu hút sự chú ý của họ

examples: He spoke the final words of the play.
The final word on policy determination belongs to the committee.
This latest evidence could be the final nail in the coffin for Jackson's case.
She just went all to pieces during finals.
The train departed from New York City, with Chicago as its final destination.
words.defineEn: happening or coming at the end of a series of actions, events, etc.
words.defineVi: xảy ra hoặc sắp kết thúc một loạt các hành động, sự kiện, v.v.

examples: His family comes first.
This software first saw the light of day back in 1993.
With the signing of the treaty, a powerful new European alliance first saw the light of day.
She dived head first into the water.
The horse took the first fence well.
words.defineEn: coming or happening before any other person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra trước bất kỳ người nào khác hoặc điều

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: After his latest brush with infamy, the footballer is keen to stay out of the tabloids and is keeping a low profile.
I used to watch Footballers' Wives when it came on.
And that was my greatest reward, and it’s the greatest reward any footballer can ever get.
words.defineEn: someone especially a professional who plays football
words.defineVi: một người nào đó đặc biệt là một chuyên gia chơi bóng đá

words.defineEn: someone who plays the sport of football as part of a team
words.defineVi: một người chơi môn thể thao bóng đá như là một phần của một đội

words.defineEn: a group of players who play football together, following the sport's rules and aiming to score goals
words.defineVi: một nhóm cầu thủ chơi bóng cùng nhau, tuân theo luật của môn thể thao này và nhằm mục đích ghi bàn

examples: I've just turned forty.
My dad works forty hours a week.
Since the forties he has led his own big bands.
A fool at forty is a fool indeed.
My grandparents have been married for over forty years.
words.defineEn: the number 40; the number of fingers that four people have
words.defineVi: số 40; số ngón tay mà bốn người có

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The girl held her father's hand tightly.
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
These girls play for keeps.
The poor girl was almost beside herself.
words.defineEn: someone who is a child and a female
words.defineVi: một người là một đứa trẻ và một phụ nữ

words.defineEn: used to wish a person success
words.defineVi: dùng để chúc một người thành công

examples: I'm happy to get a little more bang for my bucks.
As they say, a happy heart is better than a full purse.
Since she moved to a smaller apartment, my mother is as happy as a flea in a doghouse!
With his new job and his new car, Andy is a happy camper.
After their break-up, she was happy to see the back of her ex-boyfriend.
words.defineEn: emotionally feeling good
words.defineVi: cảm xúc tốt

examples: Put your name here.
Here's the heart of the matter, Bill.
Here, wet your whistle.
Here are my calculations.
Come here!
words.defineEn: to, in, or at this position or place
words.defineVi: đến, trong, hoặc tại vị trí này hoặc địa điểm

examples: Hi, what is your name?
Hi, would you like to join us for lunch?
He introduced himself by saying, "Hi, my name is Alex."
Hi, nice to meet you.
Hi, here to buy your country.
words.defineEn: we say when we see someone and want to greet them
words.defineVi: chúng ta nói khi chúng ta thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ

examples: The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
The hotel looks out over the harbor.
Hotel prices start at €80 for a double room.
The hotel offers a range of available room options to suit different budgets.
words.defineEn: a building where we give money to stay and eat food in when we are traveling
words.defineVi: một tòa nhà nơi chúng tôi cho tiền để ở và ăn đồ ăn khi chúng tôi đi du lịch

examples: You raise some interesting points.
We had a very interesting discussion about climate change.
It's an interesting proposal.
All of them had an interesting story to tell.
The game's premise and mechanics are interesting, but there's just no meat on the bone when it comes to story and gameplay variety.
words.defineEn: catching and keeping our attention because of being unusual, exciting, etc.
words.defineVi: thu hút và giữ sự chú ý của chúng tôi vì khác thường, thú vị, v.v.

examples: The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
The interview is coming up next week.
Several candidates were called for a second interview.
The interview only took ten minutes, but it felt like hours.
She gave a second interview later that year but this time the gloves were off.
words.defineEn: to ask someone questions about a particular topic on the TV, radio, or for a newspaper
words.defineVi: để đặt câu hỏi cho ai đó về một chủ đề cụ thể trên TV, đài phát thanh hoặc cho một tờ báo

examples: His carelessness lost him the job.
Jobs that pay £5 an hour.
This job puts years on you.
My job is the tough one.
The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
words.defineEn: the work that we do regularly to earn money
words.defineVi: công việc mà chúng tôi làm thường xuyên để kiếm tiền

examples: I was too nervous to eat.
I felt a bit nervous when the elevator suddenly stopped between floors.
I was nervous before my dental appointment, but the dentist made me feel comfortable.
He grew nervous about the deal and asked his bank manager to stop the cheque.
I was pretty nervous to start with, but after a while I was fine.
words.defineEn: worried and anxious about something or slightly afraid of it
words.defineVi: lo lắng và băn khoăn về điều gì đó hoặc hơi sợ điều đó

examples: Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
The U.S. tax code now loads the dice in favor of private pension plans.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
The conflict has now reached a new level of intensity.
words.defineEn: at this moment or time
words.defineVi: tại thời điểm này hoặc thời gian

examples: The nurse takes my blood pressure.
The nurses had to spoon-feed my mother after her stroke.
I thanked the nurse for her compassionate care during my stay in the hospital.
The nurse kindly explained the procedure to me and helped me feel at ease.
Nurses play an important role in providing healthcare and assisting doctors in treating patients.
words.defineEn: someone who has been trained to care for injured or sick people, particularly in a hospital
words.defineVi: một người đã được đào tạo để chăm sóc người bị thương hoặc bị bệnh, đặc biệt là trong bệnh viện

examples: Other students followed her lead and boycotted lectures.
The lovers held each other close.
Other football stakeholders also got a share of the cake.
Join the other kids.
Share your thoughts with other people.
words.defineEn: being the one that is different, extra, or not included
words.defineVi: là cái khác, bổ sung hoặc không được bao gồm

examples: The HR department only shared the employee's personal information on a need-to-know basis.
Ron's personal life is as miserable as sin.
All personal belongings are left at the owner’s risk.
His personal work was kept securely in an upstairs studio.
Michael always puts his personal matters on ice.
words.defineEn: only relating or belonging to one person
words.defineVi: chỉ liên quan hoặc thuộc về một người

examples: This information is as good as gold.
The HR department only shared the employee's personal information on a need-to-know basis.
You can also get information on careers in social work from their website.
We received information that would load the dice in favor of our arguments.
I’ll pass the information on to our sales department.
words.defineEn: facts, details, or knowledge about a thing or person
words.defineVi: sự kiện, chi tiết, hoặc kiến thức về một điều hoặc người

examples: The phone number for customer service is printed on the back of the product.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
I called the wrong phone number and apologized for the mistake.
He asked me for my phone number and I drew a blank - I just couldn't remember it.
He memorized her phone number so he could reach her anytime.
words.defineEn: the number used for calling someone's phone
words.defineVi: số được sử dụng để gọi điện thoại của một ai đó

examples: The police officer took my name and address.
The police officer wears a uniform and a badge.
With a flashlight in hand, the police officer searched for clues at the crime scene.
The police officer arrested the thief and recovered the stolen items.
He was frogmarched off by two police officers.
words.defineEn: someone whose job is to protect people, catch criminals, and make sure that laws are obeyed
words.defineVi: một người có công việc là bảo vệ mọi người, truy bắt tội phạm và đảm bảo rằng luật pháp được tuân thủ

examples: The receptionist led the way to the boardroom.
The receptionist sat behind the desk, welcoming visitors.
The receptionist informed me that the manager is not available at the moment.
Please collect the documents from the receptionist before leaving the building.
I mean, I'm a receptionist at Soul Cycle.
words.defineEn: a person who greets and deals with people arriving at or calling a hotel, office building, doctor's office, etc.
words.defineVi: một người chào đón và giao dịch với những người đến hoặc gọi đến khách sạn, tòa nhà văn phòng, văn phòng bác sĩ, v.v.

examples: My sister has a job at a restaurant as a waitress.
My sister skillfully cooks a flavorful curry for dinner.
My sister has a girl crush on Billie Eilish.
My sister packed some Spanish limes in her picnic basket for a tangy snack on our outdoor adventure.
He loved his sister dearly.
words.defineEn: a lady who shares a mother and father with us
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ chia sẻ một người mẹ và cha với chúng tôi

examples: The rebels held the radio station.
The taxi station is just a short walk from my apartment.
The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
The bus station is located in the city center.
On the way to the station she passed a cinema.
words.defineEn: a place or building where we can get on or off a train or bus
words.defineVi: một địa điểm hoặc tòa nhà nơi chúng ta có thể lên hoặc xuống xe lửa hoặc xe buýt

examples: Students with disabilities have priority access to the lift.
The teacher praised the students for their good manners.
Other students followed her lead and boycotted lectures.
The classroom has rows of chairs for students.
The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
words.defineEn: a person who is studying at a school, university, or college
words.defineVi: một người đang học tại một trường học, trường đại học, hoặc cao đẳng

words.defineEn: someone whose job involves driving a taxi and taking people to different places
words.defineVi: một người có công việc liên quan đến việc lái xe taxi và đưa mọi người đến những nơi khác nhau

examples: Teachers should read more poetry to children.
Teachers are up in arms about new school tests.
Better ask teacher about.
The teacher placed the books on the desk.
The teacher called out our names one by one for attendance.
words.defineEn: someone who teaches things to people, particularly in a school
words.defineVi: một người dạy mọi thứ cho mọi người, đặc biệt là trong một trường học

examples: Could you keep an eye on my bag while I go to the toilet?
You'll have to get down on all fours to clean behind the toilet.
That toilet has a face on it too.
My friend only wishes a toilet with washing capabilities.
They have flushed the toilet.
words.defineEn: the seat we use for getting rid of bodily waste
words.defineVi: chỗ ngồi chúng ta sử dụng để loại bỏ chất thải cơ thể

examples: Give me a call tomorrow.
They're busting a move tomorrow.
We have to learn one of Hamlet's speeches for school tomorrow.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The President hits town tomorrow.
words.defineEn: the day that will come after today ends
words.defineVi: ngày sẽ đến sau ngày hôm nay kết thúc

examples: The twins have two bicycles.
The twins are like two peas in a pod.
The twins, Tom and Tim, are like two peas in a pod.
The twins' resemblance stuck out a mile.
Can you tell Tom from his twin brother?
words.defineEn: either of two children born at the same time to the same mother
words.defineVi: một trong hai đứa trẻ được sinh ra cùng một lúc với cùng một người mẹ

examples: The cruise went very quickly.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
Her condition is very serious.
The design is very basic.
words.defineEn: to a great extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ lớn hoặc mức độ

examples: Our waitress poured water for everyone at the table.
The waitress took our orders and brought us our drinks.
Andrews' favorite waitress means well when she puts in a good word for him with Tierney.
I asked the waitress for the bill after finishing my meal.
We thanked the waitress for her excellent service before leaving the restaurant.
words.defineEn: a woman who brings people food and drinks in restaurants, cafes, etc.
words.defineVi: một người phụ nữ mang thức ăn và đồ uống cho mọi người trong nhà hàng, quán cà phê, v.v.

examples: The horse took the first fence well.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
The glue is taking well.
In this grim little episode, few people come out well.
words.defineEn: in a way that is right, good, or satisfactory
words.defineVi: trong một cách đó là đúng, tốt, hoặc thỏa đáng
